AskJobType: Insert Job type (0 for full 1 for Differential)
AskJobNameToDelete: Insert the name of the job you want to delete.
AskJobNameToUpdate: Which job do you want to update
AskJobsToExecute: Which job do you want to execute ?
ExecuteHelp:
Two jobs separated by a hyphen (-): execution of the jobs between the first given job and the second given job (given jobs included). 
Multiple jobs separated by a semicolon (;): execution of the listed jobs.
